info: Value that adds to weapon dispersion per weapon damage value.
name: DISPERSION_PER_GUN_DAMAGE

info: Makes autodoc operations completely safe, independent of the players skill.
name: SAFE_AUTODOC

info: Set base thirst rate per 5 minutes. Default: 1.0
name: PLAYER_THIRST_RATE

info: 决定城市大小的数值。设置为 0 时将不会生成城市和道路，同时无法使用任何需要城市建筑作为起始位置的场景。
name: CITY_SIZE

info: A scaling factor that determines density of wild, formerly domesticated and mutated animal spawns.
name: SPAWN_ANIMAL_DENSITY

info: 开启时，则将在避难所内生成丧尸，使游戏起始时期更加困难。
name: BLACK_ROAD

info: Disables tracking food, thirst and ( partially ) fatigue for NPCs. If true, NPCs won't need to eat or drink and will only get tired enough to sleep, not to get penalties.
name: NO_NPC_FOOD

info: 开启后，将启用实验性的Z轴地图。如果游戏运行速度受到极大影响，请关闭此功能。
name: ZLEVELS

info: Disables robot spawning from alerts and from being wanted.
name: DISABLE_ROBOT_RESPONSE

info: Gun dispersion multiplier for lack of skill before threshold. GUN_DISPERSION_MULT_POST_SKILL_THRESHOLD will be added on top of it. GUN_DISPERSION_MULT_POST_SKILL_THRESHOLD=3.75 GUN_DISPERSION_MULT_POST_SKILL_THRESHOLD=1.25 means that zero skill character gets 3.75 + 1.25 = 5 extra weapon diseprsion multiplier.
name: GUN_DISPERSION_MULT_PRE_SKILL_THRESHOLD

info: 每个季节的长度，以天数为单位。警告：除了季节天数外，其他数值不会随季节长度变化，因此调整该数值可能出现不可预料的结果。
name: SEASON_LENGTH

info: Sets max stamina value of the player.
name: PLAYER_MAX_STAMINA

info: 建造建筑速度的倍率。'50' 代表比默认的快两倍，'200' 代表比默认慢两倍，设置为0时将自动根据当前季节长度调节建造建筑的速度。
name: CONSTRUCTION_SCALING

info: 设置怪物生成的密度系数。
name: SPAWN_DENSITY

info: Set base hunger rate per 5 minutes. Default: 1.0
name: PLAYER_HUNGER_RATE

info: Disable additional spawn of large groups of monsters fighting each other on swamps.
name: DISABLE_ANIMAL_CLASH

info: Enables sleep deprivation mechanics. If true, stimulants will only help you so far, and you might have to enforce proper sleep hygiene for a while.
name: SLEEP_DEPRIVATION

info: 锁定季节直到永远。
name: ETERNAL_SEASON

info: Enables CBM slots mechanics. If true CBM slots are enabled.
name: CBM_SLOTS_ENABLED

info: Gun dispersion multiplier for lack of skill after threshold. 1.25 means that character with skill level 5 gets 1.25 extra weapon dispersion multiplier.
name: GUN_DISPERSION_MULT_POST_SKILL_THRESHOLD

info: The minimum dex required for speedydex mod to add speed
name: SPEEDYDEX_MIN_DEX

info: Permits manual self-installation of bionics.
name: MANUAL_BIONIC_INSTALLATION

info: 决定怪物每次进化时间间隔的比率。数字越大代表进化越慢。设为 0.00 会停止怪物进化。
name: MONSTER_UPGRADE_FACTOR

info: 开启时，上下楼梯将被对齐在同一水平位置，即使这将让地图更丑陋。
name: ALIGN_STAIRS

info: 开启后，会在创建游戏时会在地图上的一些固定地点生成NPC，需要重置世界才能生效。
name: STATIC_NPC

info: The maximum amount of produce that can be harvested from a plant.
name: MAX_HARVEST_COUNT

info: Infected wounds from filthy clothing.  If true, getting hit in a body part covered in filthy clothing may cause infections.  Doesn't make sense if FILTHY_CLOTHES option is false.
name: FILTHY_WOUNDS

info: A boolean specifically for Crazy Cataclysm.
name: CRAZY

info: Disables vehicle part faults.  If true, disables vehicle part faults, vehicle parts will be totally reliable unless destroyed, and can only be repaired via replacement.
name: NO_FAULTS

info: Set base player healing rate per turn. Default: 0.01
name: PLAYER_HEALING_RATE

info: 大灾难发生后多少天，玩家登场。0是大灾变发生日子。可以被剧本覆盖。增加值将导致食物腐烂和怪物的进化。
name: SPAWN_DELAY

info: 开启后，辐射将会导致玩家变异。
name: RAD_MUTATION

info: 这场大灾变发生了多少天。0是春季第1天。可以被剧本覆盖。这并不会导致食物腐烂或怪物进化。
name: INITIAL_DAY

info: 在创建角色时所允许的加点方式。
name: CHARACTER_POINT_POOLS

info: Value that divides total weapon dipsersion. 15 means that weapons became 15 times more acurate than default.
name: GUN_DISPERSION_DIVIDER

info: （WIP功能）确定地形，商店，工厂，等等。
name: DEFAULT_REGION

info: 决定城市之间距离的数值。警告：过小的数值将导致地图生成非常慢！
name: CITY_SPACING

info: Morale penalty for filthy clothing.  If true, wearing filthy clothing will cause morale penalties.  Doesn't make sense if FILTHY_CLOTHES option is false.
name: FILTHY_MORALE

info: The amount of moves gained per dex above SPEEDYDEX_MIN_DEX
name: SPEEDYDEX_DEX_SPEED

info: 创建角色时的开始时间。
name: INITIAL_TIME

info: 设置物品生成的密度系数。
name: ITEM_SPAWNRATE

info: 决定怪物的抗击打程度。一个较高的数值会让怪物们更能承受伤害，一个较低的数值会让怪物们像瓷娃娃一样软弱。需要重置世界。
name: MONSTER_RESILIENCE

info: 控制旧存档数据迁移的模式
name: CORE_VERSION

info: 设置从腐烂物品中生成食腐生物的密度系数。
name: CARRION_SPAWNRATE

info: 决定是否生成起始NPC，以及如何生成他们。
name: STARTING_NPC

info: Skill threshold. Before used GUN_DISPERSION_MULT_PRE_SKILL_THRESHOLD + GUN_DISPERSION_MULT_POST_SKILL_THRESHOLD. After - only GUN_DISPERSION_MULT_POST_THRESHOLD.
name: GUN_DISPERSION_SKILL_THRESHOLD

info: 模拟丧尸群（尸潮）。丧尸刷新点在城镇周围移动，并且可能被噪声吸引。变更后必须重置世界才能生效。
name: WANDER_SPAWNS

info: Flat penalty of dispersion per point of skill under max.
name: GUN_DISPERSION_FLAT_PENALTY_PER_SKILL

info: If true, zombies will drop filthy clothing.
name: FILTHY_CLOTHES

info: 决定动态NPC生成密度的系数。
name: NPC_DENSITY

info: Set base NPC healing rate per turn. Default: 0.01
name: NPC_HEALING_RATE

info: 当该世界里最后一个角色死亡后如何处理世界存档。
name: WORLD_END

info: 开启后，会在游戏中随机生成四处游荡的NPC。
name: RANDOM_NPC

info: Disables tracking vitamins in food items.  If true, disables vitamin tracking and vitamin disorders.
name: NO_VITAMINS

info: 决定怪物的移动速率。一个较高的数值将会使怪物走得更快，设置为较低的数值就会让它们走得更慢。需要重置世界。
name: MONSTER_SPEED

info: Set base fatigue rate per 5 minutes. Default: 1.0
name: PLAYER_FATIGUE_RATE
